quests.desc: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First step, take a trip west. Then, pick up the stick of butter from the portmanteau in the parlor. And then, take a trip east. That done, take a trip north. Okay, and then, eat the stick of butter. That's it!
commands: take stick of butter from portmanteau
take stick of butter from portmanteau

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cookery. A typical kind of place. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 Hey, want to see a type K safe? Look over there, a type K safe.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The type K safe contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The type K safe is empty![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You arrive in a shower. A standard one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You scan the room for a board, and you find a board. The board is typical.[if there is something on the s_0] On the board you make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
Wow! You're in a pantry. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] trunk.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a parlor. An ordinary one.

 You make out a portmanteau. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The portmanteau contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a cookhouse. The room is well lit.



There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: portmanteau
infos.desc: The portmanteau looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: type K safe
infos.desc: The type K safe looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: trunk
infos.desc: The trunk looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: type K keycard
infos.desc: The type K keycard is cold to the touch

infos.name: stick of butter
infos.desc: that's a standard stick of butter!

infos.name: spoon
infos.desc: The spoon appears well matched to everything else here

walkthrough: take stick of butter from portmanteau

objective: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First, it would be a great idea if you could attempt to go to the west. Then, recover the stick of butter from the portmanteau within the parlor. After that, eat the stick of butter. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
